title: (x) Nine Inch Nails: Year Zero faceted sans - Gridnik {Stephen}
content:
I'm looking for this Typeface... Any clues?

I Guess it's the same typeface GQ had used way back.

Tnx!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nin-yearzero.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019211612/http:/typophile.com/files/nin-yearzero.gif) | 5.02 KB |
| [gq0804.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019211612/http:/typophile.com/files/gq0804.jpg) | 66.82 KB |
author: mtlns

comments.content:
Looks pretty likely, but it's not the same...

Thanx Miss Tiff

Anyone?
Gridnik, which is sadly nearly impossible for mere mortals to buy. [Here are some alternatives.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019211612/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/type/discuss/72157594411132298/)

Thanx for the Help... I Really like the shape of this typeface.

I Guess I Should go for United of House Ind.
It was designed by Wim Crouwel and he talks a bit about it in [this great video](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019211612/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=0NosFdqdWFw).
